titles.title: A resolution commending Oklahoma State University's wrestling team for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Wrestling Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/14/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the Oklahoma State Cowboys for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Wrestling Championship.
